## MixedPsy

Alessandro Moscatelli and Priscilla Balestrucci are developer and maintainer of the R package [MixedPsy](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/MixedPsy/index.html): tools for the analysis of psychophysical data in R. The package is described in detail in the following reference:

Balestrucci, P., Ernst, M. O., Moscatelli, A. (2022). [Psychophysics with R: The R Package MixedPsy.](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2022.06.20.496855v1.abstract) bioRxiv, 2022-06.
